name: XIMEA
tag_list: machine-vision, ip67-camera, industrial-imaging, pc-vision-system, smart-camera, x86, atom, scientific-camera, ccd, cmos, x-ray, currera, ximea, inspection-camera
overview: XIMEA designs, develops and produces broad array of industrial, scientific and smart cameras that offer maximum processing power, compatibility, and support for various vision applications in motion control, assembly, robotics, industrial inspection, process control, as well as miniature and specialized cameras for science, medical, research, security, and defense applications. CURRERA smart cameras with PC-inside gives convenience of Windows or Linux based OS and fastest GPU accelerated power in single ultra compact unit. All XIMEA cameras come with plug-and-play API’s for 25 (and counting) of the most common image processing software libraries.
